original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ upādānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho noupādāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ kilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
